about: Report an error in calculations, data, or documentation
title: '[BUG] '
labels: bug
assignees: ''
---

## Description
A clear description of the bug or error.

## Location
Where did you find the issue?
- [ ] README.md
- [ ] Report PDF
- [ ] Data files (CSV)
- [ ] Analysis scripts
- [ ] Charts/visualizations
- [ ] Other: ___

## Expected vs Actual
**Expected:** What should it say/show?
**Actual:** What does it currently say/show?

## Evidence
If applicable, provide:
- Screenshots
- Line numbers
- Calculations showing the error

## Suggested Fix
If you know how to fix it, describe the correction.

## Additional Context
Any other relevant information.
